data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nihei, Silvio S., Andrade, Marcos R., Pape, Thomas, Cerretti, Pierfilippo (2016): The Shannoniella sisters (Diptera: Rhinophoridae). Zootaxa 4061 (1): 85-92, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4061.1.9
